page.title: 13Confirmation At Hook Church.
page.content: We were the first ones at the{church. My brother was getting{confirmed. } They had a piece of paper with their names on because the{Bishop}would not know their names.The {Bishop of {Doncaster}came to {confirm}the people who were getting confirmed.There were 14 people including my brother Nigel.My Grandma came to the confirmation to see Nigel getting confirmed.There were a lot of boys there and girls.My Grandad could not go to the{church}because he was not very good at hearing.There was a newt in the {church.}When I put the books away I nearly trod on it.The first hymn was 303,the second 157 and the last song was 352.Afterwards we went to {Hook Memorial Hall}to have some biscuits, scones,tea and orangejuice aswell.Nigel sat with the other boys.
